main event: On 29 January 1955, two lights, rectangular and cylindrical in appearance, were observed in Guam.
interesting points: The object was approximately 12-15 feet long and 5 feet wide., The leading portion of the object emitted a bright light that changed to orange at the rear., The lights were seen at an elevation of 50 degrees with no visible trail or identifiable object., The observation lasted for about 3-5 seconds., The sighting occurred during a good visibility period with intermittent clouds.
sighted object: two lights appearing as a trail or exhaust
witness description: civilian employees with a credible and reliable evaluation
